body.p: Tic-Tac-Toe is a simple game that can be played by two players. The game is played on a 3x3 grid and the objective is to get three of your symbols in a row, either horizontally, vertically, or diagonally.
Here are the steps to play Tic-Tac-Toe:default_value

ol.li: Draw the 3x3 grid on a piece of paper or use a pre-made board.
Decide who will go first. This can be done by flipping a coin or any other method agreed upon by both players.
The first player places their symbol (usually an "X") in any empty square on the grid.
The second player then places their symbol (usually an "O") in any empty square on the grid.
Players take turns placing their symbols on the grid until one player gets three in a row or all squares are filled.
If a player gets three in a row, they win the game. If all squares are filled and no player has three in a row, the game is a tie.

body.p: That's it! Tic-Tac-Toe is a fun and easy game to play with friends and family.
